alert.note: Alert for Southern Front Range Including Sangre De Cristo Mountains, Wet Mountains, La Veta Pass; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 11 at 10:42AM MDT until April 11 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning in effect from Noon until 8 PM MDT Today for for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 224, 225, and zones 226 through 237, which includes all of the eastern plains of southeast Colorado, Teller county, Fremont county, the southeast mountains, and the San Luis valley... ...Red Flag Warning has been issued from 11 AM TO 8 PM Tuesday for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 226 through 237 which includes all of the eastern plains of southeast Colorado... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221 AND 225... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect until 8 PM MDT this evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 221 and 225. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 to 50 mph. * Timing...Noon until 8 PM MDT this evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Southern Front Range Including Sangre De Cristo Mountains, Wet Mountains, La Veta Pass; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument
